convulse.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if your body or a part of it convulses, it moves violently and you are not able to control it
convulse.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He sat down, his shoulders convulsing with sobs.
convulse.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if something such as a war convulses a country, it causes a lot of problems or confusion
convulse.translation[0].definitions[1].e: A wave of nationalist demonstrations convulsed the country in 1919.
